message:
Relations Visualization (#140)

* Relations UI Overlay PoC

* Debounce updates, remove update on window resize

* Support rect polygons

* Support EllipseRegion

(in Math we trust)

* Support rectange rotation

* Support proper rectange rotation

* Keypoint support

* Brush support

* Audio region support

* Support TextAreaRegion, unify bbox calculation form HTML elements

* Allow hide/show connection lines

* Support zoom

* Highlight relations

* Code cleanup, fix labels positioning

* Support Relations tag

* Fix single choise Relation

* Make highlighted relation more contrast

* Fix hook conditional call

* Support window resize

* Multiline text regions support

* Fix BBox calculation for multiline text/html regions

- Show relation on hover
- Fix Audio region tracking

* Remove logs, reduce connections transparency

* Remove excess import

* Fix connections re-render on window resize

Co-authored-by: Nikita Skryabin <nr@fenelon.ru>
Co-authored-by: Michael Malyuk <mikhail.maluyk@gmail.com>
